summary: This is a brief email correspondence from an attorney (Bobbi) transmitting a courtesy copy of an evening ECF filing related to the criminal case U.S. v. Ghislaine Maxwell (20 Cr. 330). It serves as a procedural notification in the legal proceedings.

persons.name: Bobbi
persons.context: Sender of the email transmitting a courtesy copy of an ECF filing in the Ghislaine Maxwell case.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The defendant in the criminal case referenced (U.S. v. Ghislaine Maxwell 20 Cr. 330).

connections.description: Bobbi is involved in transmitting legal filings related to the criminal case against Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: ECF Filing Submission
events.description: An electronic court filing (ECF) was submitted in the case U.S. v. Ghislaine Maxwell, with a courtesy copy transmitted via email.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated February 2, 2021, regarding the criminal case U.S. v. Ghislaine Maxwell (docket 20 Cr. 330).
An attorney or legal staff member named Bobbi transmitted a courtesy copy of an evening ECF filing.
The correspondence indicates ongoing legal proceedings in the Ghislaine Maxwell case in early 2021.
